content.raw:
I'm unable to build find the external urdfdom package when using this option in a catkin workspace. Not a normal scenario for building sdformat, I know, but I'm just mentioning it. Using the [package.xml from branch package_xml](#!/osrf/sdformat/src/package_xml/package.xml)
~~~
$ . /opt/ros/groovy/setup.bash
$ pkg-config --modversion --cflags urdfdom_headers
0.2.3
-I/opt/ros/groovy/include
$ catkin_make_isolated --cmake-args -DUSE_EXTERNAL_URDF=True
...
-- checking for module 'urdfdom'
--   package 'urdfdom' not found
-- 
-- 	URDF library not found. Please install it to use with USE_EXTERNAL_URDF or set this flag to false to use internal URDF code
-- ----------------------------------------

-- BUILD ERRORS: These must be resolved before compiling.
-- 	URDF library not found. Please install it to use with USE_EXTERNAL_URDF or set this flag to false to use internal URDF code
-- END BUILD ERRORS

CMake Error at CMakeLists.txt:184 (message):
  Errors encountered in build.  Please see the BUILD ERRORS above.
~~~
EDIT: it works for me with a normal cmake build, but I'm getting seg-faults in the tests involving urdf parsing. Still exploring.
